meanings.definition: Engaged in the pursuit of pleasure; sensually self-indulgent.
meanings.sent1: The hedonistic cat enjoyed lounging in the sun all day.
meanings.sent2: She led a hedonistic lifestyle, always seeking out new experiences.
meanings.sent3: The hedonistic squirrel couldn't resist the temptation of the nut-filled bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His hedonistic approach to life was like chasing butterflies in a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The hedonistic aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.sent1: Their hedonistic behavior at the amusement park was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The hedonistic couple indulged in luxurious spa treatments regularly.
meanings.sent3: In a hedonistic twist, the dog rolled around in the mud with pure joy.
meanings.sent4: The hedonistic clouds drifted lazily across the sky, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent5: The hedonistic laughter of children playing echoed through the park, bringing smiles to all.
